#Categories

```{r set up}

# specify directory

#Set up

study_1.1 <- read.csv(file = here("Study 1 Data", "Gratitude_Interventions_Study_1.1.csv"))

study_1.2 <- read.csv(file = here("Study 1 Data", "Gratitude_Interventions_Study_1.2.csv"))

study_1.3 <- read.csv(file = here("Study 1 Data", "Gratitude_Interventions_Study_1.3.csv"))
study_1.3$race_2 <- as.numeric(study_1.3$race_2)

study_1.4 <- read.csv(file = here("Study 1 Data", "Gratitude_Interventions_Study_1.4.csv"))
study_1.4$race_2 <- as.numeric(study_1.4$race_2)

# File paths
file_paths <- c("Gratitude_Interventions_Study_1.1.csv",
                "Gratitude_Interventions_Study_1.2.csv",
                "Gratitude_Interventions_Study_1.3.csv",
                "Gratitude_Interventions_Study_1.4.csv")

# Read and combine the CSV files
data_temp1 <- bind_rows(study_1.1, study_1.2)
data_temp2 <- bind_rows(data_temp1, study_1.3)
data <- bind_rows(data_temp2, study_1.4)

data <- data %>%
  # remove incomplete or test observations
  filter(Finished != "0", condition !="NA") %>%
  select("StartDate":"nervous")

```

```{r categories}
#Conditions

control <- subset(data, condition == 1)
control_events <- subset(data, condition == 2)
control_interesting <- subset(data, condition == 3)
control_hassles <- subset(data, condition == 4)

grat_list <- subset(data, condition == 5)
grat_letter <- subset(data, condition == 6)
grat_text <- subset(data, condition == 7)
grat_hk <- subset(data, condition == 8)
grat_sing <- subset(data, condition == 9)

```

#t-Tests (State Gratitude)

```{r measurement only (gratitude)}
# Create a list of datasets to compare
grat_datasets <- list(
  "Gratitude List" = grat_list$gratitude_all,
  "Gratitude Letter" = grat_letter$gratitude_all,
  "Gratitude Text" = grat_text$gratitude_all,
  "Chan Gratitude List" = grat_hk$gratitude_all,
  "Mental Subtraction Task" = grat_sing$gratitude_all
)

# Create an empty dataframe to store results
results_df <- data.frame(Test = character(),
                         P_Value = numeric(),
                         Estimate = numeric(),
                         Statistic = numeric(),
                         Parameter = numeric(),
                         stringsAsFactors = FALSE)

# Loop through each dataset and perform the comparison
for (i in seq_along(grat_datasets)) {
  # Perform t-test
  t_test_result <- t.test(control$gratitude_all, grat_datasets[[i]])
  # Calculate effect size
  effect_size <- effsize::cohen.d(control$gratitude_all, grat_datasets[[i]], hedges.correction = TRUE)
  
  # Add results to dataframe
  results_df <- rbind(results_df, data.frame(
    Test = paste("Measurement Only vs.", names(grat_datasets)[i]),
    Statistic = t_test_result$statistic,
    Parameter = t_test_result$parameter,
    P_Value = t_test_result$p.value,
    Estimate = effect_size$estimate
  ))
}

# Display dataframe
print(results_df)

```

```{r gratitude conditions (gratitude)}

# Create an empty dataframe to store results
results_df <- data.frame(Test = character(),
                         P_Value = numeric(),
                         Estimate = numeric(),
                         Statistic = numeric(),
                         Parameter = numeric(),
                         stringsAsFactors = FALSE)

# Loop through each combination of datasets and perform the tests
for (i in 1:(length(grat_datasets) - 1)) {
  for (j in (i + 1):length(grat_datasets)) {
    # Perform t-test
    t_test_result <- t.test(grat_datasets[[i]], grat_datasets[[j]])
    # Calculate effect size
    effect_size <- effsize::cohen.d(grat_datasets[[i]], grat_datasets[[j]], hedges.correction = TRUE)
      
    # Add results to dataframe
    results_df <- rbind(results_df, data.frame(
      Test = paste(names(grat_datasets)[i], "vs.", names(grat_datasets)[j]),
      Statistic = t_test_result$statistic,
      Parameter = t_test_result$parameter,
      P_Value = t_test_result$p.value,
      Estimate = effect_size$estimate
    ))
  }
}

# Display dataframe
print(results_df)
```
